compat-change.description: This change enables a limit on the number of {@link TelephonyCallback} objects any process may register via {@link TelephonyManager#registerTelephonyCallback}. The default limit is 50, which may change via remote device config updates. This limit is enforced via an {@link IllegalStateException} thrown from {@link TelephonyManager#registerTelephonyCallback} when the offending process attempts to register one too many callbacks.
compat-change.name: PHONE_STATE_LISTENER_LIMIT_CHANGE_ID
